name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Network Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in network security and infrastructure management. Expertise in **Cisco**, **F5**, **PaloAlto**, **Infoblox**, **Zscaler**, and **Azure**, alongside strong skills in **Python** for automation and scripting. Demonstrated proficiency in networking protocols including TCP/IP, BGP, OSPF, EIGRP, and VLAN configurations, enhancing secure and efficient communication pathways. Adept in **SDWAN** strategies, implementing **Ansible** for configuration management, and deploying **VPN** solutions to ensure robust connectivity across dispersed networks. Recognized for troubleshooting complex network issues and providing analytical insights to optimize performance and security compliance.
In addition to networking expertise, I bring hands-on experience in cloud-native application deployment on **Azure** and a strong understanding of modern tech stacks such as **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. Committed to driving innovation and real-world impact through strategic network architecture and proactive problem solving.

experience.responsibilities:

• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to communicate network requirements and provide analytical insights, simplifying the understanding of complex network interdependencies.
• Conducted performance monitoring and reporting on network load balancers, enabling proactive management of network traffic.
